item.description:
SITTER MIXER
"The sitter mixer is on! Find a sitter and join us for the Sitter/Mixer Event! The atmosphere will be part-cocktail-party and part-speed-dating with sitters. Moms will be able to mingle with qualified sitters from around the North Shore and find sitters that will meet their child care needs. All moms will also get a "Sitter Matches" list with a customized list of sitters tailored to their needs, including sitter resumes, references, and full contact information.
The event will be sponsored by Mama's No Yuck and work in conjunction with Sitter Mixer! So members will get -$12 off. It will be $25/until Nov 22 and $27after for the event for raffle prizes, swag bags, free bottle of Mama's No Yuck (Enzymatic stain and odor remover for car seats/strollers)
Sign Up at http://www.sittermixe...
(REMEMBER TO USE coupon code:meetups12off )
* December 6, 2010 (Monday)
* Mrs.Alexanders School, Beverly
* Time: 7-9 p.m

Any questions? Please contact Noona!
item.name: SITTER MIXER
